mapper.select: select storeNo, storeName, floor, imgSaveName from Store where floor = '1F' and storeCategory not in ('info')
select storeNo, storeName, floor, imgSaveName from Store where floor = '2F'
select storeNo, storeName, floor, imgSaveName from Store where floor = '3F'
mapper.insert: insert into Store (ceo, companyNo, phone, storeNo, storeName, storeCategory, floor, logo, imgSaveName, imgSize) values (#{ceo}, #{companyNo}, #{phone}, #{storeNo}, #{storeName}, #{storeCategory}, #{floor}, #{logo}, #{imgSaveName}, #{imgSize})
